skills.skill: .NET WCF and Web Api RESTful web services

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and maintain software solutions using Classic ASP, ASP.NET, C# and other related technologies.
Create RESTful web services and interact with databases using T-SQL, JavaScript, and CSS.
Build new tables, views, and stored procedures for database development and optimization.

education_certification.credential: BS in Computer Science or relevant experience
